acid splash.description: You hurl a bubble of acid at {}
acid splash.description_second: hurls a bubble of acid at {}

shocking grasp.description: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to {}
shocking grasp.description_second: fires lighning from their hand at {}

vicious mockery.description: You unleash a string of insults at {}
vicious mockery.description_second: unleashes a string of insults at {}

animal friendship.description: You convince {} that you mean no harm
animal friendship.description_second: convinces {} that they mean no harm

magic missile.description: You create three glowing darts of magical force which simultaneously strike {}
magic missile.description_second: created three glowing darts of magical force which simultaneously struck {}

magic shield.description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you.

acid arrow.description: A shimmering green arrow streaks toward {} and bursts in a spray of acid

aid.description: Your spell bolsters {} with toughness and resolve
aid.description_second: casts a spell bolstering {} with toughness and resolve
